message: But, Auntie Em! Please tell me we aren't replacing the witch we know with a witch we don't know........ Will those ruby slippers save us from having to learn to speak Russian????

In response to the question about LA and Chicago not supporting Trump in finding illegal immigrants: Yes, I support their decisions in not attempting to find illegal immigrants. The reason is because these cities are quite expensive to live in. With an increase to the taxpayer base for these cities, it's quite economically beneficial for these cities to add illegal immigrants to the current taxpayer base that they already have. These cities are so progressive, they might a well tax themselves into bankruptcy and I am going to be glad when they're crying for a bailout from the federal government. In response to the question about Trump having the potential in cutting of federal funding for sanctuary cities: Oh yes, Trump is definitely going to cut off federal funding for these cities. The more cuts, the better. It's time for these cities to swallow their own pills when they want higher taxes. Taxing their citizenry is not going to help out much. Thank you for the questions. Erika, Michael, and Brian: What do you think of the two questions by ?

Another reason Donald Trump won. There are a lot of fed up people in America.

For over 2000 yrs. we have been oppressed by so-called """"Christian Influence"""" and """"in the name of God and the Bible""""! All which have been scientifically and spiritually debunked as being false! We've endured your persecution for way too long! Longer than your racial divide that ended! Your discrimination and persecution of the LGBT community has been nothing but disgusting and disgraceful! Christian bigots have persecuted their own sons, daughters, brothers, sisters, and so on and have done nothing but divide families which is the sole core to the Christian belief. Not only have they defied the wishes of their lord they have torn apart lives which do matter! """"Gay Lives Matter""""! As a group the LGBT community has endured and withstood the persecution of many hate groups throughout the country and now it's time you stand up and RESPECT us! You can practice your beliefs, we don't have a problem with that but, don't force your religious beliefs on us! Don't discriminate against our rights! We have been discriminated and persecuted longer than any other group in history, even more so than blacks! That's right blacks won their freedom before gays! Gays include men, women, black white, latino, and asian brothers sisters sons and daughters and yet you bigots lash out against your own family members and friends! Today is a day when we can actually say........Screw You! The bible don't say anything against gays but, somewhere along the way someone had this evil intention and it spread like a disease. It's a disease, just like racism! Homophobia and Racism should be classified as a disease and since most of you that mirror these traits are right wing republicrooks and want to take this country back to the 1800's maybe we should introduce you to some therapy to cure your mental disease(s). These diseases should be treated with electro-shock therapy or a lobotomy like they used to do to people who acknowledged they were gay! Or maybe you should just get the fuck out of our country and move to the Middle East where you can terrorize a new group of people you hate! So, don't come at me with your bible this and your religious that because your just showing what kind of an asshole you really are! You're fake, period! Go force your fake religious beliefs on ISIL..........see how long they put up with your shit!
